name: UX Kit – User & Customer Personas
description:
Personas to align across teams

This is a carefully crafted Template with some smart Components to enable you to not only create personas – but cluster them into groups so you can align them across all your teams!


The main purpose of this template is to enable

  • Speed while creating personas
  • One single source of truth for your company
  • Visually appealing, beautiful personas
  • Collaboration across departments
  • Auto-Layouts all the way!


What's included

  • We typically see the need for approvals and sign-offs so you can add them


How to use it

  • Create multiple persona clusters and add the persona cards into those clusters
